Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32213 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.20.2-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-32213 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 16.20.2-4. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 16.20.2-4, affected by CVE-2022-32213
